rules_text: Whenever Anesthesiologist attacks, if you control a white permanent, teach Anesthesiologist lifelink. Otherwise, you gain 2 life. [i](To teach lifelink, put a lifelink counter on it. If it already has lifelink, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]World-class medicine made exclusively by the fittest, for the fittest.[/i]
